AI Agent

An AI agent is a software component that acts on behalf of a user or system to perform tasks. It can automate complex tasks like natural language processing, coordinate activities among multiple agents, apply logic to problems, and evaluate answers. Users can organize agents into systems to orchestrate workflows and improve performance.

Key Concepts:

  • Agency in AI
  • Complex task automation
  • Natural language processing
  • AI Agents
  • Virtual Assistants
  • Deputies to Humans
AI agent artificial intelligence machine learning AI Artificial Intelligence Machine Learning
